name: pnp-list-tenant-alert-usage
title: List SharePoint alerts usage across the tenant
shortDescription: Generate a tenant-wide report of legacy SharePoint Online list alerts before their retirement.
longDescription: SharePoint Online list alerts are being gradually retired. This script scans all sites across the tenant and generates a comprehensive CSV report of existing alerts. This information helps administrators identify and plan the migration of critical alerts to modern alternatives.

references.name: Want to learn more about CLI for Microsoft 365 and the commands
references.description: Check out the CLI for Microsoft 365 site to get started and for the reference to the commands.

references.name: SharePoint Alerts retirement announcement
references.description: Official Microsoft announcement about the retirement of SharePoint alerts.
